1267340.name: RPG Maker MV - Heroine Character Generator 6
1267340.description:
Heroine Character Generator 6 from Gee-kun-soft has arrived with the 6th collection of brand new parts for creating amazing heroine characters!

Heroine Character Generator 6 makes it easier than ever to create original female characters for your RPG project by offering matching eyes, hairstyles, accessories, clothes plus cool capes!

The more original characters you create, the more original your story becomes! So go ahead and get inspired with this new character generator!

Features:

* Clothes: 20 Female
* Accessories: 8 Female
* Capes & others: 4
* Eyes: 5 sets
* Front Hair: 5 Female
* Rear Hair: 5 Female
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.
1267340.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
